means: 愿死者灵魂安息的祈祷

sentence.Network_en: Requiescat in pace ( may he, or she, rest in peace ).
sentence.Network_cn: 愿灵安息 ( 愿他或她安息 )

sentence.Network_en: A bogoak frame over his bald head: Wilde's Requiescat.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他那歇了顶的头上端,悬挂着用黑 樫 木化石做的镜框.王水德的《安魂曲》.

sentence.Network_en: Requiescat Matthew Arnold Strew on her roses, roses And never a spray of yew.
sentence.Network_cn: 安魂曲马修·阿诺德用玫瑰花 、 玫瑰花覆盖伊,却决不要一枝紫杉!

PerfectNetExp.abs: requiem 安魂曲requiescat 祈祷require 需要

list.abs: 此时此地 | Liberavi animam meam ... Requiescat in pace 愿彼安息（坟墓上使用） Salus populi suprema lex 人民的利益是最高法律.
息止安所（拉丁语：Requiescat in pace）是一种简短的墓志铭，或是希望逝者永享安宁的短句。此语的英文缩写是“R.I.P.”，通常以全 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Latin, from requiescat in pace (see rip)

means.word_mean: 1. a prayer for the repose of the soul of a dead person

auth_sentence.content: Requiescat in pace if you choose Or rise if possible you challenged me.
